Node.definition: marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to be careful|to make sure|to take precautions
Node.definition: = action by which humans ensure their own well being by being watchful, by making sure that certain instructions are carried out, or by refraining from certain activities

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
literally: to add (an activity to one's activities); hence: = action by which humans add additional activities to those that they are currently engaged in

Node.gloss: to remove|to take|to reduce|to diminish|to hold back|to withhold
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause other humans to be less or no longer involved in a certain activity
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= process by which humans perceive a series of pictures and events in their minds; ≈ often regarded as a revelation from God; sometimes associated with things that disappear in a moment
= process by which humans perceive a series of pictures and events in their minds; ≈ often regarded as a revelation from God; sometimes associated with things that disappear in a moment
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= supernatural act of a deity, ◄ performed by the deity himself or in his name; ►in order to assert his power and greatness
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= supernatural act of a deity, ◄ performed by the deity himself or in his name; ►in order to assert his power and greatness
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity, perform the required rituals, and live in accordance with the requirements of that deity
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= process by which humans perceive a series of pictures and events in their minds; ≈ often regarded as a revelation from God; sometimes associated with things that disappear in a moment
= process by which humans perceive a series of pictures and events in their minds; ≈ often regarded as a revelation from God; sometimes associated with things that disappear in a moment
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to test|to put to the test
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities make an effort to obtain information about (other) humans by observing them while they engage in a certain activity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity, perform the required rituals, and live in accordance with the requirements of that deity
= action by which someone commits oneself to remain closely involved with another person or group, out of affection and/or solidarity
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state by which humans stand up to or oppose the authority of a person or ruler or deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to bring out|to take out|to carry out|to make (someone) leave|to make (someone) depart
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans, animals, or objects to leave a certain place or position

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
literally: house (of an object); hence: = a place that is associated with a certain class people that live there, or objects that are found there

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

Node.gloss: to lure away|to seduce|to lead astray
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause other humans to give up a certain pattern of behavior and start engaging in other activities which are usually regarded as unacceptable
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life

Node.gloss: to sweep away|to remove|to banish|to purge
Node.definition: = action by which someone makes sure that a certain event no longer takes place anywhere at all
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= front of the body of a human being, which, when a person is sitting down, forms a kind of platform that can be used for activities like throwing the lot, and that can even function as a sitting place for someone else, like a pet animal, a child or a beloved one; ≈ symbolizes affection and intimacy, and sometimes represents the entire person
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state in which knowledge, an object, or an action is kept hidden or unknown from others

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity, perform the required rituals, and live in accordance with the requirements of that deity
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= indirect male progenitor
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to accept|to want to have something to do with
Node.definition: = state in which someone is willing to accept and associate with another person or with God
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to do something that may have a negative effect on someone or something else; ◄ usually caused by an emotion of affection or compassion

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

Node.gloss: to be concerned for|to have pity on|to show mercy|to spare
Node.definition: = process by which humans or deities experience an emotion of affection for a particular object or state of event; ► resulting in unwillingness to see that object come to harm or that event to be obstructed
literally: to cover; hence: = action by which humans or deities no longer hold (other) humans responsible for certain actions
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future
= causative action by which humans kill other humans or animals by throwing rocks at them until they die

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= causative action by which animals, humans, or deities do whatever is necessary to perform a particular event

Node.gloss: to lure away|to seduce|to lead astray
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause other humans to give up a certain pattern of behavior and start engaging in other activities which are usually regarded as unacceptable
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to bring out|to take out|to carry out|to make (someone) leave|to make (someone) depart

literally: house (of an object); hence: = a place that is associated with a certain class people that live there, or objects that are found there

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
= process by which an action is repeated or continued

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior

possible literal meaning: without benefit or without success; hence: = state in which someone is considered an objectional human being who is engaged in evil behavior and does not contribute to the society in a positive way

Node.gloss: to lure away|to seduce|to lead astray
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause other humans to give up a certain pattern of behavior and start engaging in other activities which are usually regarded as unacceptable

= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= action by which humans or deities make an intensive effort to obtain in depth information about a certain object or event

Node.gloss: to look for|to try out|to test|to search out|to explore|to investigate|to examine|to cross examine|to sound out|to determine
Node.definition: = action by which someone tries to obtain information about a certain object, person, or event by examining it carefully
= action by which humans perform activities with a certain amount of skill
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions
literally: to be established; hence: = state in which information can be trusted

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which an event is considered utterly wrong and detestable

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= the sharp side or end of a sword (חֶרֶב)
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment

= causative action by which humans set towns, people, animals, and objects irrevocably apart for the service of God by destroying the towns, putting the people and the animals to death, and by setting apart valuable objects for the service of God

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= general term for any animal that has been domesticated; ≈ considered part of someone's wealth
= the sharp side or end of a sword (חֶרֶב)
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which humans gather inanimate objects from different sources to keep for oneself or store it
= central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= an object that is wholly burned ► as a gift or sacrifice to God
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= state in which an object is positioned around or against another object in such a way that the two cannot be separated easily
literally: to cleave to (one's) hand; hence: = action by which humans take possession of an object that they carry or come across, without having the authority to do so
= a reference to any object

Node.gloss: something devoted to God|something devoted for destruction
Node.definition: = state of having been set irrevocably apart for God; ► as a result of which people and animals are to be put to death, cities are to be destroyed, and other objects are to be set apart for the service of God

Node.gloss: to turn back from|to give up|to retire from
Node.definition: literally: to turn (from an activity); hence: = action by which humans or deities stop being engaged in a certain activity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: kindling of anger; hence: = process by which the anger (אַף) of deities is aroused ◄ like a fire that is kindled
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= state in which humans feel compassion for others, ◄ caused by affection for that person and/or the lack of well being of that person; ► this feeling is usually translated into action

Node.gloss: to be merciful|to have mercy (on someone)|to have compassion (on someone)
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities feel compassion for other, ◄ caused by affection for that person and/or the lack of well being of that person; ► this feeling is usually translated into action: a person who feels compassion may forgive an offence, refrain from aggression and/or punishment, or revoke punishment
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
= indirect male progenitor
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which an event is morally and ethically right

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
